title: Matchsafe, "Shagreen", ca. 1910
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, plated metal, snuff box type container, front, bottom, and back panels veneered with continuous piece of green shagreen, the front and back panels curved. Lid veneered with green shagreen with metal thrumb catch at front, and hinged near back. Striker on both left and right sides of box.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Shagreen", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. Shagreen, plated metal. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-306.
